author: Charles Creitz
title: Pompeo blasts China for causing 'enormous amount of pain' and 'loss of life' with coronavirus coverup
description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told "Hannity" Thursday that he knows many Americans are angry at China over the Beijing government's handling of the coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan and disclosed "I know that the president feels the same way."
content:
